completed_features: Initialize Next.js project with TypeScript, Tailwind CSS configuration, and install all core dependencies listed in the coding guidelines (lucide-react, next-themes, framer-motion, react-hook-form, zod, clsx, tailwind-merge). Create the basic folder structure (`app`, `components`, `lib`, `content`) and configuration files.
last_commit:
feat: initialize Next.js project with TypeScript, Tailwind CSS, and core dependencies

Set up project structure with:
- package.json with all required dependencies (next, react, tailwindcss, lucide-react, framer-motion, next-themes, react-hook-form, zod, etc.)
- TypeScript configuration with strict mode and path aliases
- Tailwind CSS configuration with dark mode support
- Basic app structure (layout.tsx, page.tsx, globals.css)
- ThemeProvider component for next-themes integration
- Content structure with initial site data
- Utility functions (cn for className merging)
- Newsletter API route with Zod validation
- Configuration files (next.config.js, postcss.config.js, .eslintrc.json)
- Folder structure (app, components, lib, content)
